materials.raw_text:
Cobalt (Co): 12.8 g 
 Mercury (Hg): 10.4 g

sourcing.instructions:

 Mercury: Obtain through a licensed dealer or chemical supply company (ensure proper safety protocols). 
 Samarium: Available from specialty metal suppliers or online.
